instructions: Touch and hold in the body of the email, then select the text you want to include. Tap the Reply button , then tap Reply.
Double-tap in the email body, then tap Insert Drawing. Use the drawing and annotation tools. Tap Done, then tap Insert Drawing.
Enter a URL or search term in the search field at the top of the page. Tap a search suggestion, or tap Go on the keyboard to search for exactly what you typed.
Tap the Share button , then tap Find on Page. Enter the word or phrase in the search field. Tap the Search Down button to find other instances.
